birth_place.zh-cn: 陕西省保安县金鼎镇芦子沟村
birth_place.en: Luzigou Village, Jinding Town, Bao'an County, Shaanxi Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，刘志丹胞弟。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and the younger brother of Liu Zhidan.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，陕甘边革命根据地创建者之一，刘景范胞兄。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, one of the founders of the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base, and the elder brother of Liu Jingfan.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范的祖父。
description.en: Grandfather of Liu Jingfan.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Liu Jingfan.

description.zh-cn: 由刘志丹和刘景范等人组建的革命武装力量。
description.en: A revolutionary armed force formed by Liu Zhidan, Liu Jingfan, and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕西、甘肃地区建立的苏维埃区域。
description.en: A soviet area established by the Communist Party of China in the Shaanxi and Gansu regions.

description.zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国下的一个省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region under the Chinese Soviet Republic.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕甘宁地区的省级委员会。
description.en: The provincial committee of the Communist Party of China in the Shaanxi-Gansu-Ningxia region.

nodes.id: 中共陕甘宁特区委员会

zh-cn: 中共陕甘宁特区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕甘宁特区的领导机构。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Shaanxi-Gansu-Ningxia Special Region.

description.zh-cn: 在中国共产党领导下进行的土地所有权改革运动。
description.en: The land ownership reform movement carried out under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由中国共产党领导的革命根据地。
description.en: A revolutionary base area led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会在西北地区的派出机构。
description.en: An agency dispatched by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China to the Northwest region.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第一野战军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第一野战军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在解放战争时期的一支主力部队。
description.en: A main force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army during the Chinese Civil War.

nodes.id: 政务院人民监察委员会

zh-cn: 政务院人民监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的国家监察机关。
description.en: The state supervision organ in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的纪律检查机构。
description.en: The disciplinary inspection body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国地质部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国地质部
en: Ministry of Geology of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院主管地质矿产勘查的组成部门。
description.en: Formerly a component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of geological and mineral exploration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 因小说《刘志丹》引发的一起重大文字狱事件，牵连甚广。
description.en: A major literary inquisition case triggered by the novel 'Liu Zhidan', which implicated a large number of people.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国民政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部
en: Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管民政事务的组成部门。
description.en: The component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of civil affairs.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1992年间的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China from 1982 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都。
description.en: Capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范的妻子，小说《刘志丹》的作者。
description.en: Wife of Liu Jingfan and author of the novel 'Liu Zhidan'.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范与李建彤的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Liu Jingfan and Li Jiantong.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范与李建彤的幼女，作家、音乐家。
description.en: The youngest daughter of Liu Jingfan and Li Jiantong, a writer and musician.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范与李建彤的儿子。
description.en: The son of Liu Jingfan and Li Jiantong.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范是刘志丹的胞弟。
description.en: Liu Jingfan is the younger brother of Liu Zhidan.

description.zh-cn: 刘士杰是刘景范的祖父。
description.en: Liu Shijie is the grandfather of Liu Jingfan.

description.zh-cn: 刘志丹与胞弟刘景范等人组建了南梁游击队。
description.en: Liu Zhidan, along with his brother Liu Jingfan and others, formed the Nanliang Guerilla Detachment.

description.zh-cn: 刘景范跟随长兄刘志丹参加革命，并组建南梁游击队。
description.en: Liu Jingfan followed his elder brother Liu Zhidan to join the revolution and co-founded the Nanliang Guerilla Detachment.

position.en: Chairman of the Revolutionary Military Committee

position.zh-cn: 苏维埃政府主席兼军事部长
position.en: Chairman of the Soviet Government and Minister of Military Affairs

relationships.target: 中共陕甘宁特区委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘景范在陕甘宁特区从事政权管理工作期间，组织了土地改革。
description.en: Liu Jingfan organized land reform while engaged in administrative work in the Shaanxi-Gansu-Ningxia Special Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第一野战军
政务院人民监察委员会

position.en: First Deputy Director, Party Group Secretary

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，刘景范担任政务院人民监察委员会第一副主任，并于1953年升任党组书记。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Liu Jingfan served as the First Deputy Director of the People's Supervision Committee of the Government Administration Council, and was promoted to Party Group Secretary in 1953.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国地质部

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，刘景范因反党小说《刘志丹》案被牵连。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liu Jingfan was implicated in the case of the anti-Party novel 'Liu Zhidan'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国民政部
中国共产党中央顾问委员会
